artist: Engraver: William Bond; Publisher: John Major
description: portrait of Petitot bust length facing front and looking right; long curly hair and moustache; wearing cloak with white lacy collar; oval frame
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

on sheet in black: W. Bond Sculpt. / PETITOT / LONDON / Published by John Major, 50 Fleet Street / Sept\'r 15th 1826 | in pencil on sheet 2-193
portfolio: From Annecdotes of Painting in England
title: Portrait of Petitot
